script:
I'll create a 1-minute video script about a cat's journey from reckless to responsible living, matching each line to available videos.

```json
{
"config": [
    {"line": "Meet Max, a cat with big dreams and even bigger confidence.", "video": "cat_on_hind_legs_flexing_muscles.mp4"},
    {"line": "He lived life in the fast lane, quite literally.", "video": "cat_driving_motorcycle.mp4"},
    {"line": "Until one day, disaster struck.", "video": "cat_motorcycle_fire_crash.mp4"},
    {"line": "Max found himself in the aftermath, surrounded by destruction.", "video": "cat_in_burnt_truck.mp4"},
    {"line": "Alone with his thoughts, he stared out at the rain, contemplating his choices.", "video": "cat_sitting_alone_rainy_window.mp4"},
    {"line": "The pain in his eyes told a story of regret and lost direction.", "video": "cat_sitting_watery_eyes.mp4"},
    {"line": "Max decided it was time for a change.", "video": "cat_standing_looking_around.mp4"},
    {"line": "He began hitting the books, determined to educate himself.", "video": "cat_studying_at_desk.mp4"},
    {"line": "Long hours at the computer became his new normal.", "video": "cat_typing_office_desk.mp4"},
    {"line": "He even took classes to expand his knowledge.", "video": "cat_classroom_desk_laptop.mp4"},
    {"line": "Max discovered new passions, like cooking nutritious meals.", "video": "cat_cooking_steak_frying_pan.mp4"},
    {"line": "He exercised responsibly, building strength the right way.", "video": "cat_lifting_weights_protein_shake.mp4"},
    {"line": "Simple pleasures became meaningful, like playing with colorful toys.", "video": "cat_playing_colorful_ball.mp4"},
    {"line": "Max learned to reconnect with others, finding joy in companionship.", "video": "cat_cats_cuddling_sitting_lying.mp4"},
    {"line": "He became a mentor to younger cats, sharing his hard-earned wisdom.", "video": "cat_adult_cat_with_kitten_sitting.mp4"},
    {"line": "Max embraced the comfort of human connection once again.", "video": "cat_cuddling_with_human.mp4"},
    {"line": "And finally, he found peace in the quiet moments at home.", "video": "cat_laying_in_living_room_wide_eyed.mp4"},
    {"line": "Max's journey taught him that true happiness comes from balance, not speed.", "video": "cat_sit_to_lie_under_bed.mp4"}
]
}
```
final

lines.line: Meet Max, a cat with big dreams and even bigger confidence.
He lived life in the fast lane, quite literally.
Max found himself in the aftermath, surrounded by destruction.
Alone with his thoughts, he stared out at the rain, contemplating his choices.
The pain in his eyes told a story of regret and lost direction.
Max decided it was time for a change.
He began hitting the books, determined to educate himself.
Long hours at the computer became his new normal.
He even took classes to expand his knowledge.
Max discovered new passions, like cooking nutritious meals.
He exercised responsibly, building strength the right way.
Simple pleasures became meaningful, like playing with colorful toys.
Max learned to reconnect with others, finding joy in companionship.
He became a mentor to younger cats, sharing his hard-earned wisdom.
Max embraced the comfort of human connection once again.
And finally, he found peace in the quiet moments at home.
Max's journey taught him that true happiness comes from balance, not speed.

parsed_script.full_script: Meet Max, a cat with big dreams and even bigger confidence. He lived life in the fast lane, quite literally. Until one day, disaster struck. Max found himself in the aftermath, surrounded by destruction. Alone with his thoughts, he stared out at the rain, contemplating his choices. The pain in his eyes told a story of regret and lost direction. Max decided it was time for a change. He began hitting the books, determined to educate himself. Long hours at the computer became his new normal. He even took classes to expand his knowledge. Max discovered new passions, like cooking nutritious meals. He exercised responsibly, building strength the right way. Simple pleasures became meaningful, like playing with colorful toys. Max learned to reconnect with others, finding joy in companionship. He became a mentor to younger cats, sharing his hard-earned wisdom. Max embraced the comfort of human connection once again. And finally, he found peace in the quiet moments at home. Max's journey taught him that true happiness comes from balance, not speed.
